Alright, I ordered this feature phone yesterday late night, probably after midnight, and I received the product in the Noon, fast delivery though.
As for the product, Yes, this is the 100% authentic Nokia 210, since they are the official dealers, things just can't go wrong. Great phone overall as a daily driver for basic tasks.

reviews: Love it! The package came so quickly, within 2 days! It was really well packed, and came in the original box, sealed. The phone has PTA approval as well which is great. Inside the box are the phone, a user manual, a one-year warranty card, a pick to open the sim compartment, charging plug, charging cable, a front screen protector and a set of hands free wired earphones. The phone itself is really lightweight, quite large, feels really nice to hold and has a great color! It’s dual sim, I’ve only put in one sim so far and it’s working great! Turned it on, it’s working really fast. The camera’s very basic, but that’s to be expected. Other than that it’s wonderful! Really satisfied!

title: QMobile Hot 5 - 6.26" HD+ U Notch Display, 3GB RAM/32GB ROM, 13MP+0.3MP Dual Rear Cameras/13MP Front Camera, 2.0 GHz Octa Core Processor, 3000 mAh Battery
reviews: Love it! The package came so quickly, within 2 days! It was really well packed, and came in the original box, sealed. The phone has PTA approval as well which is great. Inside the box are the phone, a user manual, a one-year warranty card, a pick to open the sim compartment, charging plug, charging cable, a front screen protector and a set of hands free wired earphones. The phone itself is really lightweight, quite large, feels really nice to hold and has a great color! It’s dual sim, I’ve only put in one sim so far and it’s working great! Turned it on, it’s working really fast. The camera’s very basic, but that’s to be expected. Other than that it’s wonderful! Really satisfied!

As for the product, Yes, this is the 100% authentic Nokia 210, since they are the official dealers, things just can't go wrong. Alright, I ordered this feature phone yesterday late night, probably after midnight, and I received the product in the Noon, fast delivery though.
As for the product, Yes, this is the 100% authentic Nokia 210, since they are the official dealers, things just can't go wrong. Great phone overall as a daily driver for basic tasks.

title: QMobile Hot 5 - 6.26" HD+ U Notch Display, 3GB RAM/32GB ROM, 13MP+0.3MP Dual Rear Cameras/13MP Front Camera, 2.0 GHz Octa Core Processor, 3000 mAh Battery
reviews: Love it! The package came so quickly, within 2 days! It was really well packed, and came in the original box, sealed. The phone has PTA approval as well which is great. Inside the box are the phone, a user manual, a one-year warranty card, a pick to open the sim compartment, charging plug, charging cable, a front screen protector and a set of hands free wired earphones. The phone itself is really lightweight, quite large, feels really nice to hold and has a great color! It’s dual sim, I’ve only put in one sim so far and it’s working great! Turned it on, it’s working really fast. The camera’s very basic, but that’s to be expected. Other than that it’s wonderful! Really satisfied!

Alright, I ordered this feature phone yesterday late night, probably after midnight, and I received the product in the Noon, fast delivery though.
As for the product, Yes, this is the 100% authentic Nokia 210, since they are the official dealers, things just can't go wrong. This is a feature phone, you can basically use it for calls and messages without worrying about the battery running out, but wait, you can also do some more things with this phone, it has built in games to pass the time when you are bored 🥱 and you can also take a picture in emergency situations, since the camera is not that great and not a key feature of this phone, but I would say, it's better to have something than nothing! 
Great phone overall as a daily driver for basic tasks.
